title: Game Client Issues
body:
so im having game troubles. i can open the client as usual, browse game modes, shop etc. the problem begins when i get into game after champ select, nothing opens. the timer hits zero and goes right to the reconnect screen, no second window opens. i click reconnect but nothing happens

what do?

replies.body: Your connection sounds to be unstable, and struggling to transition form champion select and to the game server.  I recommend going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to remove any blocks along the way.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can work with you directly to see what's causing this specific issue.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to get some logs and attach it to your ticket for more context.  We'll see you there!
league of legends has stopped working :( :( :(
